# rict <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="139" alt="" />

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `rict` is to provide clean, election tables to accompany maps.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `rict` from [GitHub](https://github.com/rict) with:

``` r
pak::pak('christopherkenny/rict')
```

## Example

If you have a `redist_map`, you can call `rict()` to produce a district-level summary table.

```{r example}
library(rict)
rict(wv)
```
